# replace(at:withValue:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the value at the given index.

## Declaration

```swift
func replace(at index: Int, withValue value: Any!) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **index**: The index of the value that will be replaced.
- **value**: The new value.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if successful; otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Discussion

If the value is `nil` or if the index is out of bounds, this method raises an exception.

## Replacing values and labels

- **replaceLabel(at:withLabel:)**: Replaces the label at the given index.
